page.title: 04PICKLESCOTT VILLAGE
page.content: {Picklescott}is a village just off the{Longmynd}.It has got quite a lot of friendly people living around there. Picklescott is ten miles west of {Shrewsbury}.There are four farms in Picklescott.There aren't any shops and there are only about fourteen houses there.There is a stream running through the village. I think Picklescott needs a lot more facilities-like buses and village shops.The"Bottle and Glass" is the only pub in Picklescott.The nearest {junior school}is in{Dorrington}which is two miles away.The nearest {secondary school}is the Mary Webb at {Pontesbury.
